title: Mobile App Developer
description: Job DescriptionPhonePe is hiring Mobile App Developers to create high-performance Android and iOS applications, integrate payment APIs, and ensure smooth app functionality.
requirements: Strong knowledge of Kotlin/Java for Android or Swift for iOS
Experience with REST APIs and payment gateway integration
Understanding of mobile app architecture and best practices
Knowledge of CI/CD and testing frameworks for mobile apps

title: Software Developer
description: Job DescriptionDevelop and maintain web applications using Python and React. Work with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and deploy scalable software solutions that meet business objectives.
requirements: Write clean, maintainable and well-tested code.
Design and implement scalable backend services and APIs.
Collaborate with product managers and designers to deliver product features.
Participate in code reviews and mentor junior engineers.
2+ years professional software development experience (or strong projects / internships).
Comfortable with at least one backend language (Node.js, Python, Java, Go, or C#).
Familiar with relational databases (Postgres/MySQL) and at least one NoSQL store.
Experience with containers (Docker) and basic CI/CD concepts.

title: Android Developer
description: Job DescriptionDevelop Android apps using Kotlin, Android Studio, and Jetpack libraries.

title: Data Analyst
description: Job DescriptionAnalyze datasets, build dashboards, and provide insights to business stakeholders.
requirements: Experience with Power BI or Tableau

description: Job DescriptionDevelop responsive, high-performance web interfaces using React.js, Tailwind CSS, and REST APIs.
requirements: Experience with Tailwind CSS or Bootstrap

title: Backend Developer
description: Job DescriptionDevelop scalable backend logic, build REST APIs, integrate databases, and optimize performance.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Job DescriptionCreate UI wireframes, prototypes, and design user-centered interfaces.

title: Cloud Engineer
description: Job DescriptionManage AWS services, Kubernetes clusters, and cloud automation pipelines.

title: AI/ML Engineer
description: Job DescriptionDesign and train ML/DL models, optimize inference pipelines, and work with data engineers for model deployment.
requirements: Experience with NLP or Computer Vision

title: Frontend React Developer
description: Develop modern UI components using React.js and integrate REST APIs.

title: Python Backend Developer
description: Work on API development, authentication systems, and database optimization.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Implement automation tools, manage Kubernetes clusters, monitor cloud performance.

title: Flutter Developer
description: Develop cross-platform mobile apps using Flutter. Integrate APIs and Firebase backend.

title: Software Engineer
description: Job DescriptionGoogle is looking for talented software engineers to work on large-scale distributed systems, backend architectures, AI/ML integrations, and performance-driven applications.
requirements: Strong in C++, Java, or Python
Experience with distributed systems or cloud
Bachelor’s degree in CS or equivalent experience

title: Backend Developer
description: Job DescriptionMicrosoft is looking for backend developers to build high-performance services, scalable APIs, and cloud-native microservices using .NET, Azure, and distributed architecture.
requirements: Strong experience in C#, .NET, or Java

title: Data Analyst
description: Job DescriptionAccenture is hiring Data Analysts to analyze datasets, create dashboards, and support key business decisions using SQL, Python, and BI tools.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Job DescriptionAmazon is hiring DevOps Engineers to manage cloud infrastructure, automate deployments, enhance CI/CD pipelines, and ensure system reliability on AWS.
requirements: Strong AWS experience (EC2, Lambda, ECS, S3)

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Job DescriptionDevelop and deploy ML models and pipelines for Google applications, working with TensorFlow, Python, and cloud infrastructure to build scalable AI solutions.
requirements: Experience with data pipelines & cloud platforms (GCP)
Knowledge of algorithms, statistics, and ML techniques
Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in CS, AI, or related field

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Job DescriptionAdobe is seeking a UI/UX Designer to create engaging user interfaces for their products, improving usability and overall user experience.
requirements: Proficient in Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD
Strong visual design and interaction skills
Experience in user research and prototyping

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Job DescriptionZoho is hiring Full Stack Developers to build end-to-end SaaS applications, working with Angular, Node.js, and MongoDB for scalable solutions.
requirements: Experience with MongoDB or relational databases
Knowledge of RESTful APIs and microservices

title: Cyber Security Analyst
description: Job DescriptionIBM India is hiring Cyber Security Analysts to monitor and protect IT systems, identify vulnerabilities, and implement security solutions across platforms.
requirements: Knowledge of SIEM tools, firewalls, and IDS/IPS

title: AI/ML Engineer
description: Job DescriptionNvidia India is seeking AI/ML Engineers to develop and optimize deep learning models, implement GPU-accelerated pipelines, and deploy AI solutions for cutting-edge applications.
